main.name: Danial
main.description: I eat, sleep and learn something new
main.bio: Hi there, I am Danial Zulhakim bin Norazman! You might also know me as Danial. I start to explore about coding from 2020 until now. As a new website developer, I'm trying to learn something new to improve my knowledge about coding everyday. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in developing website and I want to pursue my dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I hope one day I can be a trainer who trained thousand's of new developers across the globe and I will apply my developing skills in a range of cool builds and challenges.

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: On the way to be the best website developers in the world! Building the Snova Foundation as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Danial is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Danial has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
